Articles.Content:
Howdy all,

After dropping some of my security/Privacy routines, it looks like I finally made it to these forums and can post. Me hopes this won't be a problem in the future.

Anyway, I've been using and lurking with KSP since 1.02. With the start of the pre-release 1.1 and the sudden jump from modders to quickly (Too soon?) provide compatibility, I thought it might be time to finally chime in. Besides, I've been wanting to create a mod or two of my own.

Well, Awesome program KSP is! Awesome modders KSP has! ;)

Welcome to the community, DarkonZ! It's nice to know you'll possibly be our newest modder.

Enjoy your stay.

Hello DarkonZ and welcome to the forum!

It's always a pleasure to welcome another lurker into the fold.  Looking forward to seeing you around.

Happy landings!
